subject: Order #SSN5901
description_text:
Hello, my order is going tonthe wrong address it should be 721 E 10th Ave,
Munhall, PA 15120. NOT 710 E. 10th ave.
Please let me know if this can be corrected. Thank you. Please let me know
ASAP.

conversations.body_text: Hello the address should be 721 E. 10th MUNHALL, Pa 15221.   NOT 710 E. 10th. Have you shipped this product yet ? If so please provide tracking #,  if not, please update address information and send thank you.
Hi snaps seven,    Okay, we've updated it to the correct address for you.

Thank you very much. Simsonn customer service is very helpful and I will
report this on my Youtube channel after the product arrives and inspected.
I look forward to further purchases from Simsonn.

Thank you.

On Wed, Jan 14, 2026, 3:41 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi snaps seven,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
